entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a nurse who is concerned about Harry's health and is checking his pulse.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who is aware of the danger posed by dementors and is concerned about Harry's health.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has been affected by a dementor and is showing symptoms such as clamminess.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy is a student who would likely mock Harry if he had to go to the hospital wing.

relationships.description: Madam Pomfrey is concerned about Harry's health and is checking his pulse.
Professor McGonagall informs Madam Pomfrey about the danger posed by dementors and their effect on people.
Professor McGonagall is concerned about Harry's health and suggests that he should spend the night in the hospital wing.
Madam Pomfrey is informed by Professor McGonagall about Harry's condition and the need for bed rest.
